root: ^Family is important, my child. They’re the ones who stick by you when the world gets hard. What does family mean to you?

s: ^It means everything to me. I want to make you proud.
^I care about family, but sometimes it feels like too much.
^I don’t know. I feel like I’m always letting everyone down.

Family_Everything: ^That’s a good way to think, but remember, family isn’t about being perfect. It’s about supporting each other. What are you doing to support the family?

s: ^I help out when I can, and I’m trying to stay on the right path.
^I don’t know if I’m doing enough, but I’m trying.

Stay_Right_Path: ^You’re doing what you can, and that’s more than enough. Keep going, my child. You’re stronger than you know.
Trying_To_Do_Enough: ^Effort matters more than results, especially in family. Just don’t give up on yourself or us.
Feels_Too_Much: ^I get that, my child. Family can be overwhelming, but you’re not in this alone. Why do you feel this way?

s: ^It feels like too much pressure to be what everyone expects.
^I feel like I’m giving and giving, but I never get anything back.

Too_Much_Pressure: ^Pressure can be heavy, but you don’t have to carry it alone. We’re here to support you, not weigh you down.
Giving_Without_Return: ^I understand how you feel, but family is about unconditional love. Sometimes you give without expecting anything in return.
Letting_Everyone_Down: ^You feel that way because you care, but it’s not true. You’re not letting anyone down, my child. What makes you feel this way?

s: ^I’ve made mistakes, and I feel like I can’t make up for them.
^I just don’t feel like I’m enough, no matter what I do.

Made_Mistakes: ^Everyone makes mistakes, but they don’t define you. What matters is what you do next. Start fresh and keep trying.
Not_Enough: ^You’re more than enough, my child. Don’t let doubt take root in your heart. You’ve got so much potential.
